data.taskTitle: Create CommandEditor component for editing commands
Create CommandEditor component for editing commands
data.approach: Create a drawer component with Monaco editor for markdown editing, frontmatter fields for metadata, and integration with existing Commands API

summary: Created CommandEditor.svelte component for editing slash commands
Integrated Monaco editor for markdown content editing
Added YAML frontmatter fields editor (description, author, version, tags)
Implemented template selection for new commands
Added split view with live markdown preview
Fixed prop naming to match config page integration (isOpen vs open)

suggestedTasks.title: Add command validation for slash commands
suggestedTasks.description: Validate command content structure, check for required sections, warn about missing frontmatter fields
suggestedTasks.reason: CommandEditor has basic structure but no content validation beyond required title

suggestedTasks.title: Add keyboard shortcuts to CommandEditor
suggestedTasks.description: Add Cmd/Ctrl+S to save, Escape to close, standard Monaco shortcuts already work
suggestedTasks.reason: Improve UX for power users editing commands frequently

patterns: Use drawer-end pattern for right-side panels
Monaco editor via @monaco-editor/loader for code editing
YAML frontmatter parsing with regex extraction
gotchas: Prop naming must match consumer - isOpen not open
Monaco editor initialization requires async loading
